sources.title: The Boot - Chakmeh (1992)
sources.description: Synopsis Chakmeh is a warm and pleasant story of a little girl who gets a pair of new red rubber boots. Unfortunately, at home she notices the other boot has disappeared, and she can't find it anywhere. A boy see how much the boots meant to the girl, and decides to help in the search. Cast:  Ali Atashkar ...  Ali  Samaneh Jafar-Jalali ...  Samaneh  Raya Nasiri ...  Mother  Osamah Sami ...  Town boy Title: the Boot - Chakmeh (1992) Directed by: Mohammad-Ali Talebi Date of birth: 22 November 1958, Tehran, Iran Writing credits: Mohammad-Ali Talebi Music: Mohammad Reza Aligholi Year: 1992 Country: Iran Language: Farsi Color: Color Runtime: 60 min
